import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { ShoppingBag, Heart, Settings, MapPin, Eye, Calendar, Package, Store, Plus, Award } from 'lucide-react'; const UserProfile = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('orders'); // Mock user data - in real app this would come from API/auth context const userData = { id: 'user_123', firstName: 'John', lastName: 'Doe', email: 'john.doe@example.com', phone: '+1 (555) 123-4567', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face', location: { city: 'New York', state: 'NY', country: 'USA' }, accountType: 'buyer', // 'buyer' or 'seller' canSell: false, // true after upgrade isSeller: false, // true if user has selling capabilities stats: { totalPurchases: 12, totalSpent: 850, favoriteItems: 23, reviewsGiven: 8, rating: 4.6, // as a buyer reviewCount: 5 }, joinedDate: '2023-06-15', membershipLevel: 'Silver', // Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum isVerified: true }; // Tab configuration - different tabs for sellers const getTabConfig = () => { if (userData.isSeller) { // Seller tabs return [ { id: 'overview', label: 'Overview', icon: ShoppingBag }, { id: 'management', label: 'Management', icon: Settings }, { id: 'dashboard', label: 'Dashboard', icon: Eye }, { id: 'products', label: 'My Products', icon: Package }, { id: 'settings', label: 'Settings', icon: Heart } ]; } else { // Buyer tabs return [ { id: 'orders', label: 'Order History', icon: ShoppingBag }, { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending Orders', icon: Package }, { id: 'wishlist', label: 'Wishlist', icon: Heart }, { id: 'settings', label: 'Settings', icon: Settings } ]; } }; const tabConfig = getTabConfig(); const handleUpgradeToSeller = () => { // In real app, this would make API call to upgrade account // For now, just update the user state to seller mode userData.isSeller = true; userData.canSell = true; setActiveTab('orders'); // Reset to first tab (now Sales History) window.location.reload(); // Simple refresh to update UI }; // For testing - toggle between buyer and seller views const handleToggleSellerMode = () => { // In real app, this would come from API/auth context // For demo purposes, we'll toggle the seller state userData.isSeller = !userData.isSeller; userData.canSell = userData.isSeller; window.location.reload(); // Simple refresh for demo }; return (
{/* Header */}

); }; // Order History Tab const OrderHistoryTab = ({ userId }) => { const [statusFilter, setStatusFilter] = useState('all'); return (

); }; // Seller Overview Tab (for sellers) const SalesHistoryTab = ({ userId }) => { return (
